tender.title: Construction of road from Kalpani Bazar to Salam Chowk Raghobil via Paka Masjid with 2 nos box type culvert approximately 3.5 Km under Chunbari VCDC, Salbari, Baksa under CMs Goodwill Mission Project for the year 2023-24. TN_26_63
